column1: #text=Last Saturday , I went to get my hair cut at my favorite hair salon .
#text=I walked into the salon , told the girl at the desk why I was there , and sat down in one of their comfy chairs to wait .
#text=I browsed through magazines while I waited .
#text=My hair stylist walked up and told me she was ready .
#text=She took me to her chair , I sat down and we talked about what I wanted done that day .
#text=Then she walked me over to the hair washing station .
#text=I sat down and leaned my head back and she washed my hair with warm water and really nice smelling shampoo .
#text=When she was done , she towel dried my hair and we walked back to her station .
#text=I sat down , she put a cape around me to catch the hair she cuts .
#text=And she began to cut my hair .
#text=When she finished she blew it dry and asked me how I liked it .
#text=So we walked over to the desk , I paid my bill , left her a tip , and left the salon .
